summary: Let you upgrade your weak restore potions into powerfull ones.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Requires:[/b]
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm

The point of this mod is to improve common and weak restore potions into powerfull potions. It\'s a good way to reduce the weight you\'re carrying.

It\'s very simple:

Just go to any cooking pot, in the misc section.

[b]Magicka[/b]

4 Potions of Minor Magicka + 1 Red Mountain Flower = 1 Potion of Vigorous Magicka

2 Potions of Magicka + 1 Red Mountain Flower = 1 Potion of Vigorous Magicka

1 Potion of Plentiful Magicka + 1 Red Mountain Flower + 1 Mora Tapinella = 1 Potion of Vigorous Magicka

[b]Healing[/b]

4 Potions of Minor Healing + 1 Blue Mountain Flower = 1 Potion of Vigorous Healing

2 Potions of Healing + 1 Blue Mountain Flower = 1 Potion of Vigorous Healing

1 Potion of Plentiful Healing + 1 Blue Mountain Flower + 1 Juniper Berry = 1 Potion of Vigorous Healing

[b]Stamina[/b]

4 Potions of Minor Stamina + 1 Purple Mountain Flower = 1 Potion of Vigorous Stamina

2 Potions of Stamina + 1 Purple Mountain Flower = 1 Potion of Vigorous Stamina

1 Potion of Plentiful Stamina + 1 Purple Mountain Flower + 1 Fly Amanita = 1 Potion of Vigorous Stamina
author: Valz Reznov
